pinyin: nei4 rong2 guan3 li3 xi4 tong3
yong4 hu4 chuang4 zao4 nei4 rong2

definition: heavy on form, light on substance/to stress form at the expense of content
pinyin: zhong4 xing2 shi4 qing1 nei4 rong2

sentences.english: Still, I'd like to see more innovation in content aggregators on the iPad.
sentences.chinese: 我依舊想在iPad內容聚合器上看到更多的創新。

sentences.english: Look for more to come and enjoy today's feature.
sentences.chinese: 敬請期待後續報道，享受今天的內容。

sentences.english: The rest is the content of the site with some light blueish hover effects.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的內容有淡青色的懸浮效果。

sentences.english: Replaceability is limited to changing the dependency to depend on something different.
sentences.chinese: 可替換性僅限於修改依賴關係以依賴不同的內容。

sentences.english: The subject of any other monograph must comply throughout its period of use.
sentences.chinese: 任何另外的專論的內容必須遵守其使用週期。

sentences.english: Parts for public use and functional segments are the pleas of industri…
sentences.chinese: 公用性和功能性內容是外觀設計專利侵權的抗辯事由。

sentences.english: Drache to confidential action content, therefore has not to clarify in this matter.
sentences.chinese: 卓凱爲了保密行動內容，故一直沒有就此事作出澄清。

sentences.english: The remainder of this section introduces those models.
sentences.chinese: 本章節的剩餘內容介紹了這些模型。

sentences.english: Specify a constraining rule on the text in an element with mixed content.
sentences.chinese: 在具有混合內容的元素的文本中指定一個約束規則。

sentences.english: Redundancy is a linguistic phenomenon that the linguistic form is more than its linguistic content.
sentences.chinese: 羨餘現象，是指語言的表達形式多於表達內容。

sentences.english: And she had a dictation with me this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，她和我一塊聽寫了那些內容。

sentences.english: The requirements of enterprise establishment are one of the important contents of enterprise organization law.
sentences.chinese: 企業設立條件是企業組織法規範的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: Capital structure is the core of financial structure.
sentences.chinese: 資本結構是企業財務結構的核心內容。

sentences.english: Consult your legal counsel if you have any doubts about reusing content.
sentences.chinese: 若對重用內容有任何疑問，請諮詢您的法律顧問。

sentences.english: Bearing and rearing better children is an important part of the birth control policy of our country.
sentences.chinese: 優育是我國計劃生育政策的一個重要內容。

sentences.english: Testing plays an important part in university's teaching and quality administration.
sentences.chinese: 考試是高等學校教學管理和質量管理的重要內容之一。

definition: to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
